Oceanian Regional Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Oceanian regional preparatory committee for a joint event of Koreans in the north and south and overseas
for implementing the June 15 joint declaration was inaugurated on February 4.
 The committee consists of Koreans in Australia and New Zealand.    
 Vice-Chairman of the General Association of Koreans in Australia Jang Jin Min was elected chairman of the preparatory committee, Chairwoman of the General Association of Koreans in Australia Kim Un Sil honorary chairwoman and 13 public figures vice-chairmen.

articles.content:
Abolition of NSL Demanded in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Student Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 South-North Joint Declaration reportedly made public a statement on February 6, denouncing the deceptive moves of the Grand National Party of south Korea to check the abolition of the "National Security Law".
 The GNP is insisting that the debate on the repeal of the NSL may cause the people's split and conflict and spark off a political dispute, which is action to hoodwink the people who are out in the struggle for abolition of the NSL, the statement said.    
 Noting that the people's split and conflict are being made by the GNP, it stressed that the south Korean people would no longer be taken in by the deceptive tricks of such pro-American and anti-reunification conservatives as the GNP.

Foreign Figure Skaters Arrive Here
    Pyongyang, February 12 (KCNA) -- Chinese, Russian, Romanian, Lithuanian, Bulgarian, Belorussian, Swiss and Ukrainian figure skaters arrived in Pyongyang today to participate in the 14th international figure skating festival for Paektusan Cup to be held on the occasion of the February holiday.
